Pictured: Pep Guardiola spotted in Germany entering Bayern Munich club offices

Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has been spotted in Germany today – at the offices of his former club Bayern Munich!

Sky’s German branch posted an unclear photograph of the Catalan – although made it clear that it was him – entering the office at Bayern’s Säbener Straße via the underground car park alongside team manager Kathleen Krüger.

Why Guardiola is there will naturally lead to some discussion and theories, but he is under a long-term contract to Manchester City, and the visit is described by Sky as Pep ‘using the international break to pay a nice visit to his old club and former colleagues at Bayern.’

Pep was in charge of Bayern for three years from 2013 to 2016, winning the Bundesliga three times. The German giants are currently undergoing something of a crisis under Niko Kovac, and perhaps Pep is there to lend him some advice.

quote.msg:
Pictured: Pep Guardiola spotted in Germany entering Bayern Munich club offices

Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has been spotted in Germany today – at the offices of his former club Bayern Munich!

Sky’s German branch posted an unclear photograph of the Catalan – although made it clear that it was him – entering the office at Bayern’s Säbener Straße via the underground car park alongside team manager Kathleen Krüger.

Why Guardiola is there will naturally lead to some discussion and theories, but he is under a long-term contract to Manchester City, and the visit is described by Sky as Pep ‘using the international break to pay a nice visit to his old club and former colleagues at Bayern.’

Pep was in charge of Bayern for three years from 2013 to 2016, winning the Bundesliga three times. The German giants are currently undergoing something of a crisis under Niko Kovac, and perhaps Pep is there to lend him some advice.
